name: Blueberry Yum Yum
description: Blueberry Yum Yum is a hybrid strain whose popularity was ushered in by rap artist Ludacris and his song centered on the strain. While certainly the progeny of the famed Blueberry indica, its other parent is suspected to have been a Durban Poison sativa. Because of its parents’ polarity, Blueberry Yum Yum can express a wide spectrum of effects, but consumers typically report uplifting, happy effects perfect for any time of the day. Though dominated by an unmistakable blueberry aroma, accents of earthy mint and pine can also be detected on the palate.
descriptionPlain: Blueberry Yum Yum is a hybrid strain whose popularity was ushered in by rap artist Ludacris and his song centered on the strain. While certainly the progeny of the famed Blueberry indica, its other parent is suspected to have been a Durban Poison sativa. Because of its parents’ polarity, Blueberry Yum Yum can express a wide spectrum of effects, but consumers typically report uplifting, happy effects perfect for any time of the day. Though dominated by an unmistakable blueberry aroma, accents of earthy mint and pine can also be detected on the palate.

highlightedReviews.text: I've been smoking on this strain for almost a month now and I absolutely love it. Since it is a hybrid, it is completely possible to smoke a fat bowl then go to work and be happy the whole shift ğŸ˜ blueberry yum yum is extremely uplifting and will definitely make you giggly. I feel like this strain, specifically puts me in a fantastic mood, I love it. I would highly recommend blueberry yum yum for everyone. If you're into it, I would HIGHLY recommend nature walks/sesh's by the water (rivers, ponds, the ocean, etc.) it's a great way to clear your mind and the perfect time to connect with nature. Blaze on! ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
Hmmm...what do I think about this strain? Ah! Nothing but deliciousness  ;-) I was like...sooo this is what Ludacris was rapping about!!!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: White Nightmare, Monkey Paw, Lost Coast OG, Crazy Miss Hyde, and Blueberry Yum Yum
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
We're rolling into 2015 with five new strains nominated by you using the Leafly app! If you had a jarring, eventful transition into the new year, theseÂ hybrids are just what you'll need to recover balanced equilibrium. Or, for those who had a relaxing night in, one of these new varieties should be all you need to stay on track for a blissful, stress-free 2015 launch.
We know many of you are no stranger to these new strains, so be sure to leave a review sharing your thoughts if you've had a chance to try one already!Â 
Â  Â 1. White Nightmare
Characteristics of White Nightmare:

Blue Dreamâ€™s soaringÂ sativaÂ effects andÂ fruityÂ flavors collide with White Moonshineâ€™s resinous coat of milkyÂ trichomesÂ to produce White Nightmare. The sativa-dominantÂ hybridÂ brings a forceful,Â sweetÂ aroma ofÂ berriesÂ andÂ Haze. The flavor stays true to its Blue Dream genetics but with anÂ earthy, hash-like aftertaste. White Nightmare generates a stimulating stream ofÂ euphoriaÂ and bliss thatÂ elevates the moodÂ and brings with it a comfortable,Â relaxingÂ body high.

Â  Â 2. Monkey Paw
Characteristics of Monkey Paw:

Monkey Paw takes its name from its fingerling buds that resemble the curled paws of primates. It is a fabled old school strain whose roots sprouted in Michigan and has built a solid reputation for itself across the Midwest. ThisÂ hybridÂ is a compelling mixture ofÂ Acapulco GoldÂ andÂ Colombian GoldÂ sativasÂ that are balanced byÂ Afghaniâ€™sÂ indicaÂ influence to produce aÂ pungentÂ combination ofÂ sweetÂ andÂ fruityÂ flavors. Its aroma is reminiscent of the thick musk ofÂ SkunkÂ varieties with sharp notes of zestyÂ citrusÂ that cut the senses. The aftertaste of fresh fruits, likeÂ grapeÂ andÂ blueberry, serves as precursor to theÂ relaxingÂ effects that calm bodyÂ painsÂ andÂ stimulate the stomach.Â 

Â  Â 3. Lost Coast OG
Characteristics of Lost Coast OG:

Lost Coast OG is a 60/40 indica-dominantÂ hybridÂ that marriesÂ Chemdawg 4Â genetics with those of two age-oldÂ heirloom strains, Pakistani Kush andÂ Lemon Thai. Flavors of sourÂ citrusÂ andÂ earthyÂ musk burst through on the exhale in show of its signature OGÂ terpeneÂ profile. This California native induces a soaring cerebral buzzing sensation that brings new vitality toÂ mood,Â creativity, andÂ conversation. The potently euphoric effects can sometimes skid into anxiety with large doses, so novices should approach this OG with some degree of caution.Â 

Â  Â 4. Crazy Miss Hyde
Characteristics of Crazy Miss Hyde:

Crazy Miss Hyde is a surprisingly balancedÂ hybridÂ given her name. She is a lively combination of theÂ uplifting,Â sativa-dominantÂ BelladonaÂ and the powerhouseÂ indicaÂ Northern Lights. The buds deliver a potent mixture ofÂ earthyÂ flavors likeÂ mentholÂ and chocolate with aÂ sweetÂ vanillaÂ influence. The effects tend to be focused in the head, with thought provoking stimulation andÂ creativityÂ that can border onÂ anxietyÂ when over-consumed. With the right dosing, the indica influence levels out the effects of Crazy Miss Hyde and induces aÂ relaxingÂ sense ofÂ euphoria.

Â  Â 5. Blueberry Yum Yum
Characteristics of Blueberry Yum Yum:

Blueberry Yum Yum is aÂ hybridÂ strain whose popularity was ushered in by rap artist Ludacris and his song centered on the strain. While certainly the progeny of the famedÂ BlueberryÂ indica, its other parent is suspected to have been aÂ Durban PoisonÂ sativa. Because of its parentsâ€™ polarity, Blueberry Yum Yum can express a wide spectrum of effects, but consumers typically reportÂ uplifting,Â happyÂ effects perfect for any time of the day. Though dominated by an unmistakableÂ blueberryÂ aroma, accents ofÂ earthyÂ mintÂ andÂ pineÂ can also be detected on the palate.Â
